name.en: Special topic for interdisciplinary artificial intelligence
name.ch: 人工智慧跨域應用專題

goal.ch:
運用通識教育中心人工智慧跨域學分學程所開設之課程知識，以小組團隊分工合作模式，製作期末專題。讓同學可以將所學的程式語言應用在實際落地的專題應用上。從選題、數據收集、模型製作、簡報呈現、書面報告等，各有難度以及需克服的地方，考驗同學面對問題，解決問題的能力，並參與各項競賽。

表現出以下特質的同學，將可獲得較多分數：
1. 創意思考，挖掘問題
2. 嘗試以有效率的方式，獨立思考，解決問題
3. 利他主義，共好主義

執行步驟：
1. 分組成立AI團隊，針對某商業痛點或社會議題進行發想，提出包含AI技術的解決方案並實作概念驗證
2. AI團隊分工：資料科學家、資料工程師、資料分析師、專案經理 (每人身兼數職)
3. 產出成果：完整論述、AI模型或演算法、資料收集分析處理流程、人機互動介面、專題網站、專題簡報
4. 參加比賽(加分項目)：鼓勵參加合適的AI競賽
goal.en:
Utilizing the knowledge from the interdisciplinary credit program offered by the General Education Center on Artificial Intelligence, students will work in teams to create a final project. This allows students to apply the programming languages they have learned to practical and tangible projects. Each stage of the process, from topic selection, data collection, model creation, presentation, to written reports, presents its own challenges that test students‘ abilities to face and solve problems, as well as to participate in various competitions.

Students who demonstrate the following qualities will receive higher scores:
1. Creative thinking and problem identification.
2. Attempting to solve problems efficiently through independent thinking.
3. Altruism and a spirit of collaboration.

Execution Steps:
1. Form AI teams to brainstorm solutions for a specific business pain point or social issue, proposing a solution that includes AI technology and implementing a proof of concept.
2. Team roles: Data Scientist, Data Engineer, Data Analyst, Project Manager (each person may take on multiple roles).
3. Deliverables: Comprehensive discussion, AI models or algorithms, data collection and processing workflows, human-computer interaction interface, project website, project presentation.
4. Participate in competitions (bonus item): Encouragement to enter suitable AI competitions.

outline.ch:
【選修資訊】
1. 本課程第一週為遠距上課，網址：https://meet.google.com/yub-krwa-qbs
2. 索取密碼卡表單：https://forms.gle/kVFxrWCv4DkWvG488
3. 本課程為「通識教育中心人工智慧跨域應用學分學程」的專題課程，依據「人工智慧跨域應用」學分學程選修辦法 ( https://cge.ncu.edu.tw/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/％E4％BA％BA％E5％B7％A5％E6％99％BA％E6％85％A7％E8％B7％A8％E5％9F％9F％E6％87％89％E7％94％A8％E5％AD％B8％E7％A8％8B.pdf )，「學生依所屬院別，須修畢該院別於本學程所屬領域之 AI 程式語言、AI 基礎課程、AI 跨域應用及 AI 社會運用主軸課程，方可修習 AI 專題實作」。若未達修課標準，即使取用密碼卡加選成功，為維持規則公平，教師有權要求學生退選或從選課系統予以退選(2024/12/5文字說明)
【上課時間】
週二18:00-21:00，於文一113教室進行專題實作與報告，若無法出席，建議可選「人工智慧跨域應用專題(暑修)(同課號)」
【授課內容】
人工智慧跨域應用專題以「跨域應用」方向為主，以計畫導向(Project - orientated)的方式，請修課學生運用相關的數學與程式針對自己感興趣的企業或社會痛點，提出解方並實作驗證。
【課程要求】
1. 第7週論述報告(占總成績30％)
2. 第11週期中報告(占總成績35％)
3. 第16週期末報告(占總成績35％)
【修課規定】
1. 學生依所屬院別，須修畢該院別於本學程所屬領域之 AI 程式語言、AI 基礎課程、AI 跨域應用及 AI 社會運用主軸課程，方可修習 AI 專題實作。
2. 「請假、缺席、扣分」依「國立中央大學學則」第四條之規定辦理
【分組】
1. 自行找組員，第二週前完成分組，小組討論發想專題題目
2. 建議3-5人一組
outline.en:
【Elective Information】
1. The first week of this course will be conducted remotely. The link is: https://meet.google.com/yub-krwa-qbs
2. Request for password card form: https://forms.gle/kVFxrWCv4DkWvG488
3. This course is a project course within the “General Education Center of Artificial Intelligence Interdisciplinary Application Credit Program.“ According to the “Elective Guidelines for the Artificial Intelligence Interdisciplinary Application Credit Program“ (https://cge.ncu.edu.tw/wp-content/uploads/2023/10/％E4％BA％BA％E5％B7％A5％E6％99％BA％E6％85％A7％E8％B7％A8％E5％9F％9F％E6％87％89％E7％94％A8％E5％AD％B8％E7％A8％8B.pdf), “students must complete AI programming languages, foundational AI courses, AI interdisciplinary applications, and AI social applications core courses in their respective colleges before taking the AI project implementation course.“ If the course requirements are not met, even if a student successfully adds the course with a password card, the instructor has the right to require the student to withdraw or be withdrawn from the course registration system to maintain fairness (12/5/2024).
【Class Schedule】
Tuesdays from 6:00 PM to 9:00 PM, in Room 113 of the Wenyi Building for project implementation and presentations. If unable to attend, it is recommended to choose “Artificial Intelligence Interdisciplinary Application Project (Summer Session) (same course number).“
【Course Content】
The Artificial Intelligence Interdisciplinary Application Project focuses on “interdisciplinary applications“ through a project-oriented approach, encouraging students to apply relevant mathematics and programming to address business or social pain points of interest, propose solutions, and implement verification.
【Course Requirements】
1. Week 7 Discussion Report (30％ of total grade)
2. Week 11 Midterm Report (35％ of total grade)
3. Week 16 Final Report (35％ of total grade)
【Course Regulations】
1. Students must complete AI programming languages, foundational AI courses, AI interdisciplinary applications, and AI social applications core courses in their respective colleges before taking the AI project implementation course.
2. Leave of absence, absence, and point deductions shall be handled in accordance with the provisions of Article 4 of the National Central University Regulations.
【Group Formation】
1. Find your own team members and complete group formation by the second week, with the group discussing and brainstorming project topics.
2. Suggested group size is 3-5 people.
